description.lang: "iRemocon" is an universal remote controller with IR signal learning functionality for a wide variety of home appliances from Smartphone APP.iRemocon is a turn key solution to bring home automation at ease for consumers, and it is widely adopted as standard equipment of properties managed by apartment developers and custom-home builder, not only for consumers, but also Homebuilding Industry.iRemocon is also capable of working with HEMS, e.g. CT sensor or smart meter to retrieve power consumption, JEM-A controlled floor heating and ECHONET Lite capable appliances like bath water heater.iRemocon is one-stop solution for a number of needs on home automation, HEMS and Smart Lock.
This group is used to inform the member that it had been reset & leaving the network.
